Derive f(x)=x^2 and evaluate slope at x=3
```{r}
func1 <- expression(x^2)
my_deriv <- D(func1, "x")
my_deriv
x <- 3
eval(my_deriv)
```

Now derive P(a)=2(3a+2)^4âˆ’5 and find slope at a=1.2
```{r}
func2 <- expression(2*(3*a+2)^4 - 5)
my_deriv2 <- D(func2, "a")
a <- 1.2
eval(my_deriv2)
```

Same thing with g(t)
```{r}
func3 <- expression((-4*t)/((t^2 +1)^3))
my_deriv3 <- D(func3 , "t")
t <- 0
eval(func3)
```
